review: Easy to set up, easy to use and a great way to get your money's worth from Prime.  The need for a wall outlet that so many people mentioned should not be a deal breaker.  I am hoping that the movie and TV offers improve with time but for now the selections work for me.

review: It's pretty good but still missing many desired shows and movies - unless you pay for them individually! So the yearly membership fee to be a Prime member still doesn't include disney cartoon shows and/or movies (mickey's club house, frozen, and others...) There's a fee attached per show/movie.That also includes a lot of 'fairly' newer shows/movies...
author: RTS

review: As a cable cutter it fits my needs. Does it feel like the software needs further tweaking? Yup.I have a rock solid 25 mg fiber optic connection and will often completely lose connection severaltimes in a 30 minute program. This does not happen with my Apple tv on the same fiber optic andwi-fi connection, watching either Netflix or Hulu.
